ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsslindf.u | |- U = ( LSubSp ` W ) |

| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_lssss | |- ( S e. U -> S C_ ( Base ` W ) ) |

| 7 | 6 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ S e. U /\ F C_ S ) -> S = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_sseq2d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ S e. U /\ F C_ S ) -> ( F C_ S <-> F C_ ( Base ` X ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ S e. U /\ F C_ S ) -> S C_ ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_sstr2 | |- ( F C_ S -> ( S C_ ( Base ` W ) -> F C_ ( Base ` W ) ) ) |

| 15 |  | #P_rnresi | |- ran ( _I |` F ) = F |
| 16 | 15 | #P_sseq1i | |- ( ran ( _I |` F ) C_ S <-> F C_ S ) |
| 17 | 1, 2 | #P_lsslindf | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ S e. U /\ ran ( _I |` F ) C_ S ) -> ( ( _I |` F ) LIndF X <-> ( _I |` F ) LIndF W ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl3an3br | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ S e. U /\ F C_ S ) -> ( ( _I |` F ) LIndF X <-> ( _I |` F ) LIndF W ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 18 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ S e. U /\ F C_ S ) -> ( ( F C_ ( Base ` X ) /\ ( _I |` F ) LIndF X ) <-> ( F C_ ( Base ` W ) /\ ( _I |` F ) LIndF W ) ) ) |

| 21 | 2, 20 | #P_eqeltri | |- X e. _V |
| 22 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` X ) = ( Base ` X ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_islinds | |- ( X e. _V -> ( F e. ( LIndS ` X ) <-> ( F C_ ( Base ` X ) /\ ( _I |` F ) LIndF X ) ) ) |

| 27 | 19, 24, 26 | #P_3bitr4d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ S e. U /\ F C_ S ) -> ( F e. ( LIndS ` X ) <-> F e. ( LIndS ` W ) ) ) |
